mapper.select: SELECT s.service_no, s.service_category, s.service_name, s.service_price, s.service_content, s.upd_date, s.reg_date, p.partner_no, p.partner_grade, p.partner_reserve, p.partner_career, p.introduce, p.user_no, u.user_name FROM service s JOIN partner p ON s.partner_no = p.partner_no JOIN users u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE s.service_no = #{serviceNo}
SELECT s.*, f.* FROM joeun.service s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM joeun.files WHERE parent_table = 'service' AND file_code = 1 ) f ON s.service_no = f.parent_no WHERE service_no = #{serviceNo}
SELECT s.*, f.* FROM joeun.service s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM joeun.files WHERE parent_table = 'service' AND file_code != 1 ) f ON s.service_no = f.parent_no WHERE service_no = #{serviceNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service(service_category, service_name, service_price, service_content, partner_no, reg_date, upd_date) VALUES (#{serviceCategory}, #{serviceName}, #{servicePrice}, #{serviceContent}, #{partnerNo}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE service SET service_category = #{serviceCategory}, service_name = #{serviceName}, service_price = #{servicePrice}, service_content = #{serviceContent}, upd_date = now() WHERE service_no = #{serviceNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM service WHERE service_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{option.keyword}, '%') ORDER BY service_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service WHERE service_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{option.keyword}, '%')

SELECT (SELECT service_name FROM service WHERE service_no = oi.service_no) AS title, (SELECT service_content FROM service WHERE service_no = oi.service_no) AS description, p.service_date AS start, p.service_date AS end FROM payment p JOIN order_item oi ON p.orders_no = oi.orders_no JOIN orders o ON oi.orders_no = o.orders_no JOIN service s ON oi.service_no = s.service_no WHERE s.partner_no = #{partnerNo} AND o.order_status = 'CONFIRMED';
SELECT p.*, f.* FROM partner p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM files WHERE parent_table = 'partner' AND file_code = 1 ) f ON p.partner_no = f.parent_no WHERE p.partner_no = #{partnerNo};

SELECT r.*, f.* FROM review r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM files WHERE parent_table = 'review' ) f ON r.review_no = f.parent_no WHERE r.service_no = #{serviceNo};
